بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
حفظك اللّه يا أخي وعافاك وأبقاك كتبت إليك وأنا وما قبلي
بحال عافية واللّه محمود وقد كتبت إليك غير كتاب لم أرا لك
كتاب أختك في حقّي على ما فارقتني عليه وحلفت عليه في
منزل أبو الحسن ثم خرجت فلم تصنع في ذلك قليل ولا كثير
تعد التّملّي وتوعد مرّة بعد أخرى فلم أرا لذلك تحقيق شي
فالله المستعان وما كان رأيي أكتب إليك بحرف واحد لولا
خروج رسول يحيى وقد قدم غير واحد فلم أراك كتبت إلي
شي وقد وجّهت إليك يحيى وهو وكيلي فيما عليك
وعلى غيرك وصديقي وخذ كتابك

[In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful!]
God guard thee, O my brother, and keep thee in health and preserve thee. I am writing to thee being with those about me May God protect thee, o my brother and give thee health. I am writing to thee myself and those about me being
in a state of good health, and God be praised! I have already written to thee more than one letter, but I cannot find, that thou hast written in good health. Thank God! I have written to you more than one letter but cannot find that you have
written to thy sister about my claim regarding the condition on which she has separated herself from me and to which she swore in the written to your sister about my claim in reference to the condition on which she left me and to which she swore,
dwelling-house of Abu'l-Ḥasan, after which she went out and did not do in this matter little or much. in the house of Abu 'l-Ḥasan, after which she went out and did nothing in the matter small or great;
she constantly promises and threatens time after time, and of that I see no realization. She constantly promises and threatens time after time, but I have not yet seen any realisation at all.
God's help must be implored. It was not my idea to write to you a single letter of the alphabet had it not been So God's help may be implored. It was not my intention to write to thee a single letter, had it not been
that Yaḥyâ's messenger has gone out, and several have come, and I cannot find that thou hast written to me that Yaḥya's messenger has gone out, and several have come, and I cannot find that you have written to me
at all. I have already sent Yaḥyâ to thee, and he is my agent for what thou owest at all. I have sent Yaḥya to you, and he is my agent for what is due to me from you
and others and my friend. | And take thy letter. and others, and [my] frie[nd ......] And take thy letter.
